segments.text: Please come in and sit down . I ’ m happy to finally meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Same here , Ms . Drake . I've been looking forward to this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry I kept you waiting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , no , no , not at all , you were right on time . I was early . I hope I didn ’ t rush you . I ’ m glad for the opportunity to interview with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Can I get you some coffee or a cup of tea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , then let ’ s get to the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , that ’ s why I ’ m here .
segments.speaker: S2
